Welcome to the Bitshares Beet Astro UI

This open-source tool can craft multiple Bitshares operations.

Designed for use with the Bitshares Beet multiwallet.

💱 Pool exchange

Swap assets via a pool

📈 DEX limit orders

Trade on the Bitshares DEX

💸 Transfer assets

Send assets to other users

🏦 Borrow funds

Borrow from other users

🪙 Borrow bitassets

Issue collateralized debt

🏅 Buy LTM

Buy a lifetime membership

💰 Portfolio

View your portfolio

🏆 Top markets

View most active markets

ℹ️ Credit deals

Check your credit deals

MIT Licensed code built with Astro, React, ElysiaJS and Bun.
